segments.text: I got the job you recommended me for last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't know how I can thank you enough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's my pleasure . After all , you are very qualified for the position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much indeed.You helped me rebuild my self-confidence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't mention it.You ' re always been good.What do you say we go out to celebrate ?
segments.speaker: S2
